headline: BBC Underpaid Female TV Host, Tribunal Rules in Equal Pay Case
abstract: Samira Ahmed sued the British public broadcaster for back pay after she learned that a male colleague doing similar work was paid more than six times as much.
lead_paragraph: LONDON â€” The television host who took the BBC to court over unequal pay has won the first high-profile court case to be brought since the fallout over pay disparity at the public broadcaster began more than two years ago.
